description: This file defines a Python class 'GoogleSearchTools' that provides an interface for performing Google searches using the 'googlesearch-python' package. It includes methods for configuring search parameters and executing searches, returning results in JSON format.

classes.name: GoogleSearchTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for performing Google searches with configurable options, extending the 'Toolkit' base class.

methods.name: google_search
methods.description: Performs a Google search with specified query, max results, and language, returning results as a formatted JSON string.
